issue_comments.body:
- [x] Delete `manifest.json` so that the gallery is removed from the database.
- [x] Remove the include from `galleries/content.json`
- [ ] Remove the inner_path from `galleries/signed.json`
- [ ] Mark `galleries/content.json` for signing.

issues.title: Make gallery filtering tab-based
issues.body: Add another set of tabs to filter on 'New', 'Unsigned' and 'All'.

issues.title: Add redirection delay with option to cancel
